description: A reaction to a forum topic or reply, with configurable reaction types per community.

main.description: Record containing a reaction to a forum topic or reply.

subject.description: The topic or reply being reacted to.

type.description: Reaction type (e.g., 'like', 'heart', 'thumbsup'). Must match community's configured reaction set.

community.description: DID of the community where this reaction was created. Immutable origin identifier.

createdAt.description: Client-declared timestamp when this reaction was originally created.
